title: About Data Science
text: Being a data scientist is about combining statistical methods with other forms of data analysis to interpret and analyze data. This typically requires a variety of different skills and knowledge, in everything from Statistical methods to Machine Learning.

title: About Data Science
text: Being a data scientist is about combining statistical methods with other forms of data analysis to interpret and analyze data. This typically requires a variety of different skills and knowledge, in everything from Statistical methods to Machine Learning.

title: About Data Science
section: What differences/similarities do you see between data scientists and statisticians?
text:
What differences/similarities do you see between data scientists and statisticians?
There are several differences between data scientists and statisticians. - Data scientists may use things other than the scientific method to analyze and interpret data.

Data scientists focus more on practical application of a combination of different disciplines.
Statisticians focus on using established techniques such as hypothesis testing, typically in research.

There are also, however, several key similarities. - Both fields require a solid foundation of statistical knowledge - Both work involve working with and finding ways to interpret large amounts of data

title: About Data Science
section: How do you view yourself in relation to these two areas?
text:
How do you view yourself in relation to these two areas?
I view myself to be more on the data science side. Most of my background is in programming and industry experience. Statistics is a part of data science that I do not have as much fluency in. One of my goals for the certificate program is to better understand the statistical methods of data analysis so I have a more well-rounded understanding of the field as a whole.
